content: What is the process for getting a value set loaded onto tx.fhir.org?
Is there any documentation on tx.fhir.org??

I've just added two code systems to the packages repository for loading to tx.fhir.org (which @Grahame Grieve is planning to rebuild and load today). It should be relatively straightforward to do (or to have done). I haven't actually seen any documentation specifically on this, but there may be some. Happy to help if I can.
why do you want to put a value set there?
When the IG builder runs, do all VS's referenced need to be on tx.fhir.org?
